item.description:
We are venturing over the bridge - out of Newport : )..

for:

Live Comedy at Showcase Cinemas Warwick

The show starts at 8pm, We need to get there earlier in hopes of sitting as a group.

Comedy Zone at Showcase Warwick
1200 Quaker Ln., Warwick, RI, 02886
(401) 885-1621

Live comedy, with full bar and food. Nationally touring comedians every week.

Located inside Showcase Cinemas Warwick.

Cost pp $10.00 - we will be paying at cinemas.


*I RSVP'd to this with a Providence Group also - so we will meeting other Meetup friends.
item.how_to_find_us: I have never been to this so I would guess to meet our group near the full bar or call me at 401-829-8516
item.why: Its Fun and Laughter is good for you!
item.name: Comedy Night in Warwick
